Submit a violation

Hire with confidence on buildingviolation.com

You’re in control

Choose from many professionals who are interested in your building violation.
Profiles, reviews, and custom messages help you make your decision

Know what to look for

Our hiring tips offer smart practices for choosing a pro for your building violation


Read Reviews

Get an idea of the pro’s work quality and professionalism through customer reviews posted to their profile.

Look for photos or videos

Don’t see the work examples you’re looking for? Ask the pro to send what you need.

Check for credentials

If you don’t see the required credentials for your building violation listed on the pro’s profile, feel free to ask.

Be wary

Think twice when a pro severely undercuts the competition on pricing.

Need more information?

buildingviolation.com makes it easy to communicate with pros through direct messages or by phone.

Use your best judgement

Whether you’re hiring on buildingviolation.com or somewhere else.

We’re here to help

Our experienced team is available to address your questions or concerns.
Email us at info@buildingviolation.com or call (866) 545-4440 from 8am to 8pm EST.
